analyzed: 'khor lo ni rdo rje'am padma de la brten pa bzhi ste /
translated: The wheel is the four based on that vajra or lotus.

original: 'og nas rgyas par @210b ston pas rtsig pa dang ri mo'i tshul du rten dang brten par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'og nas rgyas par @210b ston pas rtsig pa dang ri mo'i tshul du rten dang brten par shes par bya'o //
translated: Since it is taught extensively below, it should be known as the support and the supported in the manner of a wall and a painting.

original: mi gsung ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du mi gsung ba'o //
analyzed: mi gsung ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du mi gsung ba'o //
translated: Not spoken is not spoken in the root tantra.

original: gzhan yang gsungs ba'i gras ni bsgrub par bya ba thams cad pa khyab ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang gsungs ba'i gras ni bsgrub par bya ba thams cad pa khyab ste /
translated: Moreover, the category of what is spoken is all that is to be accomplished, the pervader.

original: de nyid du ma'i tshul lam bskor bas na 'khor lo zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid du ma'i tshul lam bskor bas na 'khor lo zhes gsungs so //
translated: Since it is a wheel by turning in the manner of a mother, it is called a wheel.

original: mi gsung ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: mi gsung ba ni go sla'o //
translated: Not spoken is easy to understand.

original: yang na gsang ba'i padma dang rdo rje la gsungs te /
analyzed: yang na gsang ba'i padma dang rdo rje la gsungs te /
translated: Or else, it is spoken on the secret lotus and vajra.

original: nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i padma de nyid gsang bas gsang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i padma de nyid gsang bas gsang bar 'gyur te /
translated: Since that lotus is not soiled by the faults of afflictions, it is secret by that very secrecy.

original: dpe'i phyogs nas bstan pa me tog padma 'dab nas skyes kyang 'dab kyi skyon gyis ma gos pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dpe'i phyogs nas bstan pa me tog padma 'dab nas skyes kyang 'dab kyi skyon gyis ma gos pa bzhin no //
translated: From the perspective of the example, it is like a lotus that is born from its petals but is not sullied by the faults of the petals.

original: de nyid kyis phar ni rnam par rtog pa 'joms la tshur mi brdzi bas na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis phar ni rnam par rtog pa 'joms la tshur mi brdzi bas na rdo rje ste /
translated: Since it destroys conceptuality and is not destroyed by anything else, it is a vajra.

original: de nyid gsang bas gsang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid gsang bas gsang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is secret, it is secret.

original: de yang dpe'i phyogs nas bstan pa /
analyzed: de yang dpe'i phyogs nas bstan pa /
translated: That is also explained from the perspective of the example.

original: 'dus byas rdzas kyi rdo rje pha lam des phar ni rdzas thams cad 'bigs shing 'joms la tshur ni gang gis kyang mi brdzi bas de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas rdzas kyi rdo rje pha lam des phar ni rdzas thams cad 'bigs shing 'joms la tshur ni gang gis kyang mi brdzi bas de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: Like a diamond, a substance that is a vajra, it penetrates and destroys all substances and is not destroyed by anything else.

original: bdag gis zab mo'i don ma rtogs //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bdag gis zab mo'i don ma rtogs // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: I do not understand the profound meaning.

original: bdag gi sgra ni rdo rje phag mo bdag gis te /
analyzed: bdag gi sgra ni rdo rje phag mo bdag gis te /
translated: The term “I” is “I, Vajravārāhī.”

original: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can kun nga rgyal bcag cing zab mo'i lam la gzhug par bya ba'i phyir gsungs kyi /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can kun nga rgyal bcag cing zab mo'i lam la gzhug par bya ba'i phyir gsungs kyi /
translated: This was said in order to destroy the pride of all sentient beings in the future and to introduce them to the profound path.

original: rdo rje phag mo nyid ni rdo rje 'chang gi sprul pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo nyid ni rdo rje 'chang gi sprul pa ste /
translated: Vajravārāhī is an emanation of Vajradhara.

original: de yang lung las /
analyzed: de yang lung las /
translated: That is also stated in the Tantra of the Questions of Subāhu:

original: 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga //
analyzed: 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga //
translated: The expounder is I, the Dharma is I,

original: rang gi tshogs ldan 'khor yang nga /
analyzed: rang gi tshogs ldan 'khor yang nga /
translated: and the retinue endowed with my assembly is also I.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs pas so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: zab pa ni phung po ma yin pa'i thabs te /
analyzed: zab pa ni phung po ma yin pa'i thabs te /
translated: The profound is the method of non-aggregates,

original: 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags rnam par dag par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags rnam par dag par byed pa ste /
translated: where desire purifies desire,

original: bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya'o //
translated: which should be known from the guru's mouth.

original: zhe sdang la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du shes par bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhe sdang la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du shes par bya ba ni /
translated: One should understand anger and so forth in the same way.

original: thabs khyad par can no //
analyzed: thabs khyad par can no //
translated: This is the special method.

original: don ni don bya bas na ste bsgrub par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / thob par bya bas na don to //
analyzed: don ni don bya bas na ste bsgrub par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / thob par bya bas na don to //
translated: The meaning is the object to be accomplished, realized, and attained, because it is the object to be accomplished.

original: ma rtogs pa ni zab mo'i don de nyid khong du ma chud cing the tshom dang bcas pa dang / 'khrul pa dang bcas pa dang lha'i bu'i bdud dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa ni zab mo'i don de nyid khong du ma chud cing the tshom dang bcas pa dang / 'khrul pa dang bcas pa dang lha'i bu'i bdud dang bcas pa ste /
translated: Non-realization is the lack of understanding of that very profound meaning, along with doubt, error, and the māra of the sons of the gods.

original: bla ma dam pa la rag las zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa la rag las zhes bya'o //
translated: It is said to depend on the sublime guru.

original: gzhan yang bdag gi ni zhu ba po ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang bdag gi ni zhu ba po ste /
translated: Moreover, the self is the petitioner,

original: rdo rje phag mo'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'o //
translated: Vajravārāhī.

original: zab mo'i don ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa ste /🔽rnam par rtog pa ma bral bar gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba las so sor rtog pa dang sgra mkhan dang / mkhan po dang / so sor thar pa'i dge slong la sogs @211a * //
analyzed: zab mo'i don ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa ste / rnam par rtog pa ma bral bar gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba las so sor rtog pa dang sgra mkhan dang / mkhan po dang / so sor thar pa'i dge slong la sogs @211a * //
translated: The profound meaning is the abandonment of all conceptual thoughts.

original: pas rtogs par mi 'gyur bas na zab pa dang phra ba dang gting dpag dka' ba'o //
analyzed: pas rtogs par mi 'gyur bas na zab pa dang phra ba dang gting dpag dka' ba'o //
translated: Since it is not realized by those who are not free from conceptual thoughts, such as the pure and impure, the grammarians, the preceptors, the monks who are experts in the pratimoksha, and so on, it is profound, subtle, and difficult to fathom.

original: ma rtogs pa ni thams cad gcig gi ngo bor ma rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa ni thams cad gcig gi ngo bor ma rtogs pa'o //
translated: Nonrealization is the nonrealization of all things as having the same nature.

original: de phyir khyod kyis bdag la gsungs //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de phyir khyod kyis bdag la gsungs // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, you should explain it to me.

original: de'i phyir sgra ni gtan tshigs sam nges pa'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra ni gtan tshigs sam nges pa'i tshig yin te /
translated: Here, the word “therefore” is a reason or a definitive statement.

original: gang gi phyir na zab cing phra ba ste de'i phyir rtogs shing khong du chud ces bya bar gsungs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir na zab cing phra ba ste de'i phyir rtogs shing khong du chud ces bya bar gsungs so //
translated: Since it is profound and subtle, it is said to be realized and comprehended.

original: khyod kyis zhes pa ni 'chad pa'i skyes bu rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis zhes pa ni 'chad pa'i skyes bu rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: “You” refers to the expounder, Mahāvajradhara.

original: bdag la zhes bya ba ni zhu ba po ste /
analyzed: bdag la zhes bya ba ni zhu ba po ste /
translated: “To me” refers to the one who is requesting.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo kun tshogs bsags pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo kun tshogs bsags pa'i don du'o //
translated: for the sake of the accumulation of the collections by all future beings.

original: gsungs zhes pa ni zab pa'i lam ste /
analyzed: gsungs zhes pa ni zab pa'i lam ste /
translated: The proclaimed is the profound path.

original: de nyid du sems can kun zhugs pa'i phyir gsungs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid du sems can kun zhugs pa'i phyir gsungs zhes bya'o //
translated: Because all sentient beings enter into it, it is called proclaimed.

original: gzhan yang snod du mi rung ba kun la thab mo'i don ma bstan pa de'i phyir ro //🔽'chad pa pos zhu ba po la don phyin ci ma log pa bstan pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang snod du mi rung ba kun la thab mo'i don ma bstan pa de'i phyir ro // 'chad pa pos zhu ba po la don phyin ci ma log pa bstan pa'am /
translated: Moreover, it is because the meaning of the tantra is not taught to those who are not suitable vessels.

original: 'chad pa po che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / zhu ba po cher dad pa dang / snod dang ldan pa'i phyir dang / rgyud kyi don shin tu dkon pa'i phyir khyod kyis bdag la gsungs zhes bya bar gsungs so //
analyzed: 'chad pa po che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / zhu ba po cher dad pa dang / snod dang ldan pa'i phyir dang / rgyud kyi don shin tu dkon pa'i phyir khyod kyis bdag la gsungs zhes bya bar gsungs so //
translated: The expounder, in order to teach the meaning without error to the petitioner, or in order to make the expounder great, and in order to make the petitioner greatly faithful, and in order to make him a suitable vessel, and in order to make the meaning of the tantra very rare, says you should teach me.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Bhagavān said means

original: bcom pa ni bdud bzhi bcom pa ste /
analyzed: bcom pa ni bdud bzhi bcom pa ste /
translated: conquered is the four demons conquered,

original: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral bas phung po'i bdud bcom pa dang / 'dod chags sku ru rnam par dag pa dang / zhe sdang thugs su rnam par dag pa dang / gti mug gsung du rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pa ste /

translated: Since it is free from the nature of being one or many, it conquers the demon of the aggregates. Since attachment is pure as the body, aversion is pure as the mind, and delusion is pure as speech, it conquers the demon of afflictions.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sa ba cu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa la sku'i sgo nas chos 'chad pa dang / thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku ste /
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sa ba cu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa la sku'i sgo nas chos 'chad pa dang / thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku ste /
translated: The enjoyment body explains the Dharma through the door of the body to the tenth-ground vajra holders. The mind of perfect pristine consciousness is the dharmakāya.

original: kun la khyab pa'i tshul te yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig gi spyod yul lo //
analyzed: kun la khyab pa'i tshul te yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig gi spyod yul lo //
translated: The mode of pervading all is the domain of only the perfect buddhas.

original: sprul pa'i sku ni gsung gi sgo nas chos 'chad pa ste /
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku ni gsung gi sgo nas chos 'chad pa ste /
translated: The nirmāṇakāya explains the Dharma through the door of speech.

original: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang / mos pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang ba'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang / mos pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang ba'o //
translated: It appears to śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas who practice devotion.

original: de dag kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa dang go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa dang go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Those should be applied in order to attachment and so on.

original: lung las kyang /
analyzed: lung las kyang /
translated: Also, it says in the Tantra of the Great River of the Inconceivable Secret:

original: 'dod chags sku la gti mug gsung //
analyzed: 'dod chags sku la gti mug gsung //
translated: Desire is the body, ignorance is the speech,

original: zhe sdang thugs su shes par bya //
analyzed: zhe sdang thugs su shes par bya //
translated: and anger is the mind.

original: thams cad du ni sprul pa'i sku //
analyzed: thams cad du ni sprul pa'i sku //
translated: The emanation body is seen by all,

original: nyan thos la sogs pa yis mthong //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa yis mthong //
translated: by the śrāvakas and so forth.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzogs longs spyod //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzogs longs spyod //
translated: The complete enjoyment body of the bodhisattvas

original: chos sku sangs rgyas spyod yul te //
analyzed: chos sku sangs rgyas spyod yul te //
translated: is the dharmakāya, the domain of the buddhas.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

translated: The path of Brahmā and so forth is taught to be deluded, and the śrāvakas and so forth are abandoned as having a self-cherishing enlightenment and a teacher who is like a perfect buddha.

original: yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs nas /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs nas /
translated: Having entered the correct path,

analyzed: yang dag pa'i 'bras bu thob pas lha'i bu'i bdud bcom pa ste /
translated: the result of the correct result is attained, and the māra of the devas is conquered.

original: da yang lung las /
analyzed: da yang lung las /
translated: Again, in the scriptures it is said:🔽The māra of the devas emanates as parents, gurus,

original: pha ma dag gam bla ma dang // btsun mo dag gam lha yi bur //🔽bdud kyis yang dag sprul nas kyang //
analyzed: pha ma dag gam bla ma dang // btsun mo dag gam lha yi bur // bdud kyis yang dag sprul nas kyang //
translated: queens, and sons,

analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing skye ba med pa'i 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom pa ste /
translated: He has conquered the demon of death, which is the non-arising of all phenomena, and their natural luminosity.

original: 'chi 'pho ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: 'chi 'pho ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of death and transmigration:

analyzed: rnam par 'chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yongs su gyur pa'i 'chi 'pho ba'o //

analyzed: yang na rigs lnga dang / sku lnga la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste /

original: de yang lung las /
analyzed: de yang lung las /

analyzed: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can // zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: 'das pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /

translated: The Enjoyment Body is like a cloud, and from the blessing of that cloud-like Enjoyment Body, the Emanation Body is like a rain of drops.

analyzed: sbyor thabs bzhi po la mkhas pa'i shes rab mas /

analyzed: thabs la rtag tu bde ba sbyin pa'o //

translated: Now, in order to guard the samaya and possess the samaya in the three times,🔽it is said, “The one who is skilled in the method of union,

original: thabs kyis rtag tu bsten par bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: thabs kyis rtag tu bsten par bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: sbyor ba'i lam khyad par can la shes pas sbyor byed do //

analyzed: lam de nyid thabs kyang yin la //

original: de la mkhas pa'i shes rab ma drug ste /
analyzed: de la mkhas pa'i shes rab ma drug ste /

analyzed: de rnams dus gsum du yid la dran zhing ma brjod pa'i dam tshig dang ldan pa'i thabs su gsungs so //
translated: It is said that the method is to possess the pledge of not forgetting those three times, and not to speak of them.

original: de las bzlog pa ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni dam tshig dang mi ldan pa'o //
translated: The opposite of that is not possessing the pledge.🔽In order to teach that pledge in common,

analyzed: dam tshig de nyid thun mong du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: the text says:

analyzed: sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pa //

original: rnal 'byor ma yi gsang la brten //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi gsang la brten // zhes gsungs te /

analyzed: sbyor ba ni shes rab dang bral ba'i thabs la shes rab sbyor ba dang / thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab la /

original: thabs sbyor bar byed pa ni sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: thabs sbyor bar byed pa ni sbyor ba yin te /

original: de nyid gnyis su med par shes pa ni mkhas pa ste thabs so //
analyzed: de nyid gnyis su med par shes pa ni mkhas pa ste thabs so //
translated: The expert is the knowledge of non-duality, which is the method.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyang steng 'og dang / g-yas g-yon dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / skye gnas la sogs par gsungs so //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyang steng 'og dang / g-yas g-yon dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / skye gnas la sogs par gsungs so //
translated: Method and wisdom are also said to be above and below, right and left, color, shape, birthplace, and so forth.

analyzed: de ni gsang ba la brten pa'i the tshom yongs su bcad pa dang / gsang ba'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the method of the secret,

analyzed: gsang ba la brten pa ji ltar lags zhes pa dang / de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: it is asked, “What is the basis of the secret?” and the Bhagavān responds.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied:

original: zhes gsungs te go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs te go sla'o //

analyzed: da ni gsang ba bsten pa'i thabs sam tshul bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the method or way of relying on the secret, it is said:

analyzed: ming sring tshul lam zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The way of brother and sister, and so on.

analyzed: ming sring gi tshul 'jig rten pa'i kha na ma tho ba la sogs pa mi 'byung ba ste /
translated: The way of brother and sister is not to engage in worldly misdeeds and so on.

original: ngo tsha dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo tsha dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the absence of shame.

original: rje 'bangs kyi tshul ni dbang gi kha na ma tho ba med pa ste /
analyzed: rje 'bangs kyi tshul ni dbang gi kha na ma tho ba med pa ste /
translated: The manner of lord and subject is the absence of the fault of being controlled.

original: gzhan @223b yang rgan gzhon dang ngo tsha bkur ba'i rim pa'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: gzhan @223b yang rgan gzhon dang ngo tsha bkur ba'i rim pa'i dbang du byas te /
translated: Moreover, in terms of the order of respect for the young and old and for shame,

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa'o //
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa'o //
translated: there is no fault.

analyzed: da ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i dben pa'i gnas su sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir /

analyzed: dben pa ni kha na ma thob med pa ste /
translated: solitude is free of faults.

analyzed: de nyid gnas kyang yin la dben pa yang yin pas dben pa'i gnas so //
translated: Since that is both a place and solitary, it is a solitary place.

original: phyag rgya dang mi ldan na dam tshig nyams pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyag rgya dang mi ldan na dam tshig nyams pa'i phyir /

analyzed: gal te ma bstan dam tshig nyams / tshe 'di nyid du dmyal bar ltung //
translated: If it is not revealed, the samaya will deteriorate.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /

analyzed: dbang dang ldan zhing dam tshig dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ma bsten na /

analyzed: gsang ba'i dam tshig nyams te tshe'i dus byas te /
translated: the secret samaya will deteriorate, and when the time of death arrives,

analyzed: dmyal bar skye ba'o //

analyzed: gong du gsungs pa de nyid kyi the tshom yongs su zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig lnga gsungs te /

translated: By improper conduct and views,

translated: he said, “Nondistinct bliss harms the body’s constituents

analyzed: rlung mkhris bad kan kun nas skye // zhes gsungs te /
translated: and generates all vāyus, bile, and phlegm.”
